PropertyDef.Name: Capacity
PropertyDef.Definition: The product of the ideal capacity and the overall volumetric efficiency of the compressor.

PropertyDef.Name: CoefficientOfPerformance
PropertyDef.Definition: The Coefficient of performance (COP) is the ratio of heat removed to energy input. \X\0D The energy input may be obtained by multiplying \X\0D Pset_DistributionPortPHistoryGas.FlowRate on the 'Fuel' port of the IfcChiller by Pset_MaterialFuel.LowerHeatingValue. \X\0D The IfcDistributionPort for fuel has an associated IfcMaterial with fuel properties and is assigned to an IfcPerformanceHistory object nested within this IfcPerformanceHistory object.

PropertyDef.Name: EnergyEfficiencyRatio
PropertyDef.Definition: The Energy efficiency ratio (EER) is the ratio of net cooling capacity to the total input rate of electric power applied. By definition, the units are BTU/hour per Watt.\X\0D The input electric power may be obtained from Pset_DistributionPortPHistoryElectrical.RealPower on the 'Power' port of the IfcChiller.
